update fc_discount_coupon_record
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fc_discount_coupon_record set coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grant_role_id = #{grantRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grant_role_type = #{grantRoleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grant_time = #{grantTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_time = #{useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from fc_discount_coupon_record a inner join fc_discount_coupon on a.coupon_id = b.i where a.status = 1 and a.start_time <= now() and now() <= a.end_time
select a.id, a.code from fc_discount_coupon_record a inner join fc_discount_coupon on a.coupon_id = b.id where a.status = 1 and a.start_time <= now() and now() <= a.end_time limit #{offset}, #{rows}
